name: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store, Inc.
description: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store, Inc. is an American restaurant and gift store chain known for its Southern country-style cooking and unique, nostalgic ambiance. Founded in 1969 in Lebanon, Tennessee, Cracker Barrel has grown to become a beloved dining destination across the United States, offering a menu that features homestyle meals, breakfast served all day, and a variety of regional specialties. The company is dedicated to providing a warm and inviting atmosphere that reflects its roots in traditional Southern hospitality. Each location features a gift shop that sells a wide range of products, including food items, home decor, and nostalgic gifts, enhancing the overall customer experience. Cracker Barrel is committed to quality and freshness, sourcing ingredients responsibly and supporting local farmers whenever possible. The company also emphasizes community involvement and has various initiatives aimed at giving back to the communities it serves. Over the years, Cracker Barrel has established a reputation not just for its food, but also for its unique shopping experience, making it a popular stop for families and travelers alike. With a focus on customer satisfaction and a commitment to its core values, Cracker Barrel continues to thrive in the competitive casual dining sector.

seo.meta_title: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store | Southern Comfort Food
seo.meta_description: Explore Cracker Barrel Old Country Store, a leader in Southern comfort food and unique shopping experiences. Discover our menu and gift shop offerings.

faq.question: What type of cuisine does Cracker Barrel serve?
faq.answer: Cracker Barrel serves Southern country-style cuisine, including breakfast, lunch, and dinner options.

faq.question: Where is Cracker Barrel headquartered?
faq.answer: Cracker Barrel is headquartered in Lebanon, Tennessee, USA.

faq.question: Does Cracker Barrel have a gift shop?
faq.answer: Yes, each Cracker Barrel location features a gift shop selling a variety of merchandise.

faq.question: Are Cracker Barrel meals available all day?
faq.answer: Yes, Cracker Barrel serves breakfast all day long.
